title: IMMACULATE 4 BED 1.5 BATH SINGLE FAMILY MID CAMBRIDGE, AVAILABLE NOW
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 299599607', 'Rent: 6,995 / Month', 'Beds: 4', 'Bath: 1.5', 'Available Date: 06/15/2022', 'Pet: Negotiable', 'Rent Includes:: Water', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'IMMACULATE 4 BED 1.5 BATH SINGLE FAMILY IN MID CAMBRIDGE, AVAILABLE NOW, PARKING - On a pretty mid-Cambridge side street in the heart of the heart of Cambridge, sits 8 Cleveland.', 'A beautiful Victorian home built in 1865 & thoughtfully renovated by the current owners, it offers a wonderful balance of beauty, stability & convenience.', 'The 1st flr has been opened up to provide a seamless connection to the outside in summer or the fireplace in winter.', 'The kitchen is designed for people who love to cook & is full of light & storage.', 'The upstairs is wonderfully flexible.', 'On the 2nd floor, there are 3 bedrooms & a full bathroom, and on the 3rd floor, there are 2 bedrooms.', 'Each floor offers a nice spot for a primary bedroom & there are options for adding a bathroom & setting up a home office.', 'While the basement is unfinished, the ceilings are high & there is a french drain & new cement floor, making it the perfect spot for projects, storage, laundry & maybe more.', "Blending the best of Cambridge history with an easy modern lifestyle come and check it out this won't last!", 'FEATURES', 'A/C', 'Central Air', 'Deck', 'Dining Room', 'Dishwasher', 'Disposal', 'Duplex', 'Eat-in Kitchen', 'Fireplace', 'Granite Counter Tops', 'Hardwood Floors', 'High Ceiling', 'Laundry in Unit', 'Microwave', 'Modern Bath', 'Modern Kitchen', 'New Appliances', 'Pantry', 'Porch', 'Stainless Steel Appliance(s)', 'Storage', 'Yard']
